sentences.sContent: I was trying to think of some way to prolong the conversation.
sentences.sCn: 我在想方设法拖长这次谈话。

remMethod.val: pro(向前) ＋ long(长) → 向前延长 → 拉长， 拖延

words.tran: 延长的；拖延的；持续很久的
延伸；延长部分；[经] 延期

trans.tranCn: 延长， 拉长， 拖延
trans.tranOther: to deliberately make something such as a feeling or an activity last longer
